# Read data

See http://r.prevos.net/trumpworld-analysis/

Read the `.graphml` file.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
f <- "../data/trumpworld.graphml"
G <- f %>% read_graph(format = "graphml")
df <- igraph::as_data_frame(G, what = "both")
df$vertices <-
  df$vertices %>% 
  mutate(node = 1:nrow(.))
names(df)
str(df)
```
